comments:
Control clicking on an extension point declaration to open the schema for the extension point is resulting in an NPE.
I have my Plug-in devl target platform changed from the default which may come into play here.
Opening the schema from the outline for the same extension point declaration does work.

Hi Darin,

I can't reproduce the NPE using the default target platform.

From the code, it appears that PDE can't find "/org.eclipse.platform.doc.isv/schema.css" required for the transform.

Is the "org.eclipse.platform.doc.isv" plug-in selected in your target platform?

Thanks,

Mike

> Is the "org.eclipse.platform.doc.isv" plug-in selected in your target platform?
yes

Darin, could you try this with the latest M (3.3.1) build?

For the time being, I am going to mark this as a duplicate of bug 191973 since they have the same stack trace.  If it is not fixed in the latest M build, please let me know so we can try to readdress the problem before tomorrow's rebuild.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 191973 ***
